Text:
Oh. Oh, you are my friend forever.

I played this game for all of five sessions 15 years ago, and since then I've wanted to play it again. 

Thanks!

Glad to help. This game really should be kept around.

There are still a few fansites floating around-- helped me find these copies, and the ones I paid entirely too much money for on eBay.

RPG de Artes Marciais

scorerpg.blogspot.com

jogo OpenGame baseado no d20 System e
Street Fighter RPG.

Enjoy it!

Obs: algumas partes do livro já estão disponíveis para download!
